Project Gutenberg, founded in 1971, is the oldest producer and distributor of free ebooks.

According to Michael Hart (March 8, 1947 – September 6, 2011), founder of Project Gutenberg, the mission of Project Gutenberg is simple: to encourage the creation and distribution of eBooks.
This mission is, as much as possible, to encourage all those who are interested in making eBooks and helping to give them away.

We are FairTEC, a collective group of actors committed to digital sobriety & offering alternatives for a more sustainable digital ecosystem.
https://fairtec.io

Basta! est un média indépendant en ligne, sans pub et en accès libre, animé par 9 salariés et piloté par l'association Alter-médias. Nous traitons des questions sociales et environnementales, à travers des enquêtes, des reportages, des articles d'analyse. Notre ambition : offrir au plus grand nombre des clés pour comprendre le monde... et des leviers pour le changer.

noyb is a non-profit association committed to the legal enforcement of European data protection laws. So far, noyb has filed more than 900 cases against numerous intentional infringements - including companies such as Google, Apple, Facebook and Amazon. More than 5,200 supporting members fund our work.
#MyPrivacyIsNoneOfYourBusiness
